symptoms.name: Excessive urination
symptoms.pattern: Can be present in acute or chronic forms

symptoms.name: Fever
symptoms.pattern: Associated with pyelonephritis or allergic reaction

symptoms.name: Itchiness
symptoms.pattern: More common in chronic, gradual onset

symptoms.name: Fatigue
symptoms.pattern: More common in chronic, gradual onset

symptoms.name: Decreased appetite
symptoms.pattern: More common in chronic, gradual onset

symptoms.name: Nausea
symptoms.pattern: More common in chronic, gradual onset

symptoms.name: Vomiting
symptoms.pattern: More common in chronic, gradual onset

symptoms.name: Difficulty breathing
symptoms.pattern: More common in chronic, gradual onset

vital_signs.blood_pressure: Normal or slightly above normal in early stages of chronic disease

lab_values.urine_protein: Trace or few white blood cells in acute onset, large numbers of white blood cells including eosinophils in allergic reaction

imaging_findings.ultrasonography: May show enlarged kidneys in allergic reaction
imaging_findings.radionuclide_scanning: May show enlarged kidneys in allergic reaction

required: Signs and symptoms of tubulointerstitial nephritis
supportive: Imaging findings consistent with tubulointerstitial nephritis

differential_diagnoses: Other causes of tubulointerstitial nephritis (e.g., medication-induced, infection-induced, autoimmune diseases)
